# truenas_dataset (Data Source)

Retrieves information about an existing TrueNAS dataset.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve information about an existing dataset
data "truenas_dataset" "apps" {
  pool = "tank"
  path = "apps"
}

output "dataset_mount_path" {
  value = data.truenas_dataset.apps.mount_path
}

output "dataset_compression" {
  value = data.truenas_dataset.apps.compression
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `path` (String) Dataset path within the pool.
- `pool` (String) Pool name.

### Read-Only

- `available_bytes` (Number) Space available in bytes.
- `compression` (String) Compression algorithm.
- `id` (String) Dataset identifier (pool/path).
- `mount_path` (String) Filesystem mount path.
- `used_bytes` (Number) Space used in bytes.
